name: Dia de los Muertos -  Frida edition

metadata.name: Crying Frida
metadata.description:
Dia de los Muertos is a combination of All Saint’s Day (nov 1) and All Soul’s Day (nov 2). It’s one of Mexico’s most renowned traditions. 

Who else to help us celebrate then Mexico’s own Frida Khalo.

“…mourning was not allowed because it was believed the tears would make the spirit’s path treacherous and slippery.”

Let us celebrate.

A digital creation by Ana Novo
